topics.body:
"@Kaz":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553baddd636872220da00800#post_553baddd636872220da00800
[bq="Kaz"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/553bac676368727bb6781500#post_553bac676368727bb6781500
Can I name you nympho[/bq]
Satyro actually. Nymphomania is strictly feminine. When it's a male it's referred to a Satyromania. Named for the Satyr. A Greek half-man half-goat nature spirit closely tied to the Wild god Pan. They were said to have an almost limitless sex drive.

!http://static.boredpanda.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/ingo-else-dog-owl-friendship-tanja-brandt-4.jpg!
!http://static.boredpanda.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/ingo-else-dog-owl-friendship-tanja-brandt-8.jpg!

Fucking love Nature! So much cute and interesting things can just happen. 

And it shows that Humans are not the only ones able of making friends. Its a truly beautiful thing.

topics.body:
This is how I think dogs see other animals 

Dog: dog
Wolf: big dog
Bear: biggest dog
Fox: flat dog
Deer: vegetarian dog
Cat: hissdog
Bird: fly dog 
Fish: water dog
Squirrel: climb dog
Human: pets dog
Broom: satan
